document_title: Vaginal (private area) dryness: Causes, symptoms and diagnosis
subsection_content:
To find the cause of vaginal dryness, during the initial examination, the doctor will examine the symptoms and ask about medical history, medications or treatments that the woman is using.
The doctor may also suggest that women participate in some tests to increase diagnostic results, such as: (4)
Pelvic examination evaluates vaginal dryness by observing whether the tissue inside the vagina is thin, dry and red; Blood tests determine hormone levels or other health conditions that cause vaginal dryness.; Testing a sample of vaginal discharge rules out other causes, as well as checking for signs of infection.
